Source.Name: python-beaker
Source.Summary: A Session and Caching library with WSGI Middleware
Source.Description: python-beaker is a web session and general caching library that includes WSGI middleware for use in web applications.

Package.Name: python-beaker
Package.Summary: Beaker module bindings for Python2. A Session and Caching library with WSGI Middleware
Package.Description: python-beaker is a web session and general caching library that includes WSGI middleware for use in web applications.

Package.Name: python3-beaker
Package.Summary: Beaker module bindings for Python3. A Session and Caching library with WSGI Middleware
Package.Description: python-beaker is a web session and general caching library that includes WSGI middleware for use in web applications.
